name: Dice Doyen: Wicked Whirlings
description: XGJ23 subject two make something about two given pictures. One was a picture of a devilish dice and other was a girl with a hammer. We made a fighting game where a dice has to fight evil wirligigs. He has six weapons that he gets to use randomly and they deal different amount of damage. Our XGJ23 Team included 2 persons, Atte Siirtola and Jimi Kylliäinen.
